short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a QR code from the page URL to be scanned by handheld device. No data is sent to a third party.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Generates a scannable QR code from the current tab URL. Meant to give a easy way of opening the current page in your handheld device. No data is sent to a third party, everything is generated within your browser.
